TRANSLATION.
The song is addressed to a beautiful girl whom the songster loves. The girl is absent. (1) Ever after I saw your beautiful face on a certain day my heart is burning with love for you. (2) O! beautiful girl with face like the moon it may be God's will that we should be separated like this. I am praying God every day that I may meet you always. (3) Thinking about you I keep awake and write you this letter. Is it not to get your love that I do all these things? (4) I prefer you to a mountain of gold. On account of my love towards you my body is growing thin.
